entry.title: Luau Bath Bomb Pack of 14 - Wholesale
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dirty Bee
Type: Bath Bomb Bubbly
Price: 34.00

Dirty Bee  |  Bath Bomb Bubbly

Luau :  Tropical fruits and floral blend

Dirty Bee’s Bath Bombs are the perfect ingredient to a warm relaxing bath.  Before getting in the tub, drop of these big boys in the tub and watch the magic happen as the color fills the water (don’t you worry, it won’t stain that pretty white) to release a relaxing aroma that will surely fill the air to take your troubles away.    

We use only the VERY best, 100% American, ingredients.  When it comes to our skin, we don’t take any shortcuts to offer products that you and your entire family will enjoy for years to come.
